title: Unless you're gold or above, please don't post on boards
body:
it was brought to my attention today that I probably should not be initiating discussions about champs because I'm just silver.

Would like to make a PSA announcement right now to the ~134,000 players in bronze and silver - we should not bother posting discussions here and in fact we should probably just log off the boards because there are 47k people who are better than us and therefore our opinions, questions, and thoughts about the game are completely invalid.

Just because bronze and silver make up ~75% of the OCE population, it doesnt mean we should have a voice and it basically means we're scrubs and we haven't got a clue about how this game works.

http://puu.sh/lRbUe/7f89c5b469.png

So remember kids, even if you're part of the majority of the population on this server and you have questions or thoughts about mechanics in the game or would like to discuss quirks of particular characters with other people interested in the game, please remember that we're silver and bronze and that our opinion is worthless.

Big thank you to ~~**dont name shame**~~ for helping to highlight that 3 out of 4 people who play this game are stupid and that their opinion does not matter.

replies.body:
No need to be so dramatic about it =P

Obviously anyone is welcome to discuss things here! Just remember to be respectful about other peoples opinions.

If you want to discuss or learn more about champions, game design etc about League of Legends here are some great resources!

Design Values of League	http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/dev-blog-design-values-league-legends
Meaningful Choices	http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/lol-design-values-depth-meaningful-choices
Clarity	http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/lol-design-values-depth-clarity
Dev Corner	http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/developer-corner

And of course the Ask.fm of Riot Ghost Crawler - https://ask.fm/riotghostcrawler

You're plat 1 according to Lolking so this comment checks out.

Had you been bronze I would have reported you to a red and .... wait.......
So are you going to spend your time on the boards reporting threads that have been posted from Silver 1-down?
Your attitude really pisses me off
If you were gold or above, that might worry me. but you have no power here.

i have two accounts plat 1.

this one will be soon too :)
Ah i see you have a consequence free smurf to hide behind.
that explains SO much.
yeah he's a child, ignore him.
Awks when you are a bronze instructor â™¥

hey I think we might have played together before - chances are good cause I am S4.

But yikes - silver 5. Sorry princess yaia - I have to report your comment cause you're not gold or above. Going to report yours after I report all mine.
let me get that for you
is this thread really necessary
Kind of, Ive seen alot of summoners go "Your bronze" just to close off an argument or to try and Disprove someone.

> [{quoted}](name=Yasei Doubutsu,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7MfsWKa4,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-03-20T08:29:05.242+0000)
>
> Kind of, Ive seen alot of summoners go "Your bronze" just to close off an argument or to try and Disprove someone.

i don't see this changing that at all

Probably not, people are always gonna post stupid or dumb things.
but everyone still has a right to have a voice, even if it can be dumb.

which is valid. This is my 3rd account that i've leveled. the first 2 both peaked d4. I've done the bronze climb more than most people and they don't know anything about the game. Same goes for silver, there are mechanically skilled players in silver who can win a lane but they don't know enough about the game to push their laning lead to a winning game.

its a PSA mate. I made the mistake of commenting in these boards on the fact that some champs have kits that work better when team has synergy and suck when team has no synergy. I was silver, and I made a mistake and I should not have posted. This was pointed out to me by someone who isn't silver. I dont want the same to happen to others.

As you're plat, you're ok to comment here.

> [{quoted}](name=Essembie,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=7MfsWKa4,comment-id=00000002,timestamp=2016-03-20T08:51:08.537+0000)
>
> its a PSA mate. I made the mistake of commenting in these boards on the fact that some champs have kits that work better when team has synergy and suck when team has no synergy. I was silver, and I made a mistake and I should not have posted. This was pointed out to me by someone who isn't silver. I dont want the same to happen to others.
> 
> As you're plat, you're ok to comment here.

you can create and share ideas regardless of what rank you are. of course, most of them probably won't be very smart, but if 3 quarters of the population is silent, that's a lost of wasted ideas. ignore people with egos, their insults are irrelevant. i'm not sure if you're being serious but this thread was the only mistake made.
what about me
you were free to comment in S5. S6 I'm not so sure.
technically my elo hasn't budged a smidge, because i havent played since eld season 5. just roaming like a ghost seeing what people are upto
Ah thats why I could not find recent stats. you're good to comment mate.

so because i'm b4 i can't say something that may make sense, i was S5, in PRE FUCKING SEASON...
sorry .-., but what if they do say something that makes sense?

But I do understand your point, We bronze have said one thing... _______ is broken, aka we don't know how to counter play you so you're broken, thats unless they have zero counter play {{champion:83}} lets be honest here... yorick's ghouls have zero counter play
Best bait thread OCE 2016.
ðŸ˜Š

Everyone is entitled to post here, plus posts aren't always to do with game statistics etc, usually you'll see people asking for insight into situations such as help on a champions build, a bug in the game or an event/sale. There's even the majority of posters simply looking for a team or a duo partner to climb in ranked.
Ordinarily I'd check your rank before determining the validity of the post but you speak the truth. Comment waved through.  Sing it brother and/or sister.
Thanks man glad you understand :)

To be fair mate the whole thread was a tongue in cheek poke at bad elitist attitudes that are common in this community.  Anyone who has the butthurt because they took it seriously missed the point entirely.

I'm not sure how to think about your -textnoimagemoji-

But as Challenger 1, your comment stays.
why was the reply to my other reply deleted?
because I cant seem to do an underscore.
lol yea have to put ___ 3-5 times to make it show depending on how many you want, annoying really
hey it worked!

ass.
 
get lost, silvers can't post
Damn tue.

http://lmgtfy.com/?q=How+does+one+untwist+panties%3F

This link may or may not help you.

I /can/ name many a Plat/Diamond player that know less about this game than I do in all aspects.

Why am I not a higher rank? Because I'm lazy when it comes to climbing and have University to focus on.

What you're saying here ends up being pretty arrogant in the long run.

its not so much bronze and silvers with the horrible posts more so the kids who've just started interneting beyond playing COD and are angsty and neglected and require the attention and approval of everyone on here
Pre neckbeards?
Wait... this IS sarcasm right? or....
silver 2. sorry bro you cant ask.
